psalm.title: Psalms
psalm.text:
[[Ps 29,1]]Give to the LORD, you sons of God,
[[Ps 29,2]]give to the LORD glory and praise, 
Give to the LORD the glory due his name; 
adore the LORD in holy attire.

[[Ps 29,3]]The voice of the LORD is over the waters, 
the LORD, over vast waters.
[[Ps 29,4]]The voice of the LORD is mighty; 
the voice of the LORD is majestic.

[[Ps 29,9]]The God of glory thunders, 
and in his temple all say, “Glory!”
[[Ps 29,10]]The LORD is enthroned above the flood; 
the LORD is enthroned as king forever.

first_reading.title: Book of Isaiah
first_reading.text:
[[Is 42,1]]Here is my servant whom I uphold, my chosen one with whom I am pleased, Upon whom I have put my Spirit; he shall bring forth justice to the nations,
[[Is 42,2]]Not crying out, not shouting, not making his voice heard in the street.
[[Is 42,3]]A bruised reed he shall not break, and a smoldering wick he shall not quench,
[[Is 42,4]]Until he establishes justice on the earth; the coastlands will wait for his teaching.
[[Is 42,6]]I, the LORD, have called you for the victory of justice, I have grasped you by the hand; I formed you, and set you as a covenant of the people, a light for the nations,
[[Is 42,7]]To open the eyes of the blind, to bring out prisoners from confinement, and from the dungeon, those who live in darkness.

gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint Matthew
gospel.text:
[[Mt 3,13]]Then Jesus came from Galilee to John at the Jordan to be baptized by him.
[[Mt 3,14]]John tried to prevent him, saying, "I need to be baptized by you, and yet you are coming to me?"
[[Mt 3,15]]Jesus said to him in reply, "Allow it now, for thus it is fitting for us to fulfill all righteousness." Then he allowed him.
[[Mt 3,16]]After Jesus was baptized, he came up from the water and behold, the heavens were opened (for him), and he saw the Spirit of God descending like a dove (and) coming upon him.
[[Mt 3,17]]And a voice came from the heavens, saying, "This is my beloved Son, with whom I am well pleased."
